00038  template<typename MCSignType, typename MCStepType = Step::Metropolis<MCSignType> >
00039   class mc_generic {
00040 
00041    public:
00042 
00046     mc_generic(uint64_t N_Cycles, uint64_t Length_Cycle, uint64_t N_Warmup_Cycles, std::string Random_Name, int Random_Seed, int Verbosity,
00047       std::function<bool()> AfterCycleDuty = std::function<bool()>() ) :
00048      RandomGenerator(Random_Name, Random_Seed),
00049      AllMoves(RandomGenerator),
00050      AllMeasures(),AllMeasuresAux(),
00051      report(&std::cout, Verbosity),
00052      Length_MC_Cycle(Length_Cycle),
00053      NWarmIterations(N_Warmup_Cycles),
00054      NCycles(N_Cycles),
00055      after_cycle_duty(AfterCycleDuty),
00056      sign_av(0) {}
00057 
00063      mc_generic(utility::parameters const & P, std::function<bool()> AfterCycleDuty = std::function<bool()>() ) :
00064       RandomGenerator(std::string(P["random_name"]), long(P["random_seed"])),
00065       report(&std::cout,int(P["verbosity"])),
00066       AllMoves(RandomGenerator),
00067       AllMeasures(),AllMeasuresAux(),
00068       Length_MC_Cycle(long(P["length_cycle"])),     
00069       NWarmIterations(long(P["n_warmup_cycles"])),
00070       NCycles(long(P["n_cycles"])),
00071       after_cycle_duty(AfterCycleDuty),
00072       sign_av(0) {}
00073 
00080     template <typename MoveType>
00081      void add_move (MoveType && M, std::string name, double proposition_probability = 1.0) {
00082       static_assert( !std::is_pointer<MoveType>::value, "add_move in mc_generic takes ONLY values !");
00083       AllMoves.add(std::forward<MoveType>(M), name, proposition_probability);
00084      }
00085 
00089     template<typename MeasureType>
00090      void add_measure (MeasureType && M, std::string name) {
00091       static_assert( !std::is_pointer<MeasureType>::value, "add_measure in mc_generic takes ONLY values !");
00092       AllMeasures.insert(std::forward<MeasureType>(M), name);
00093      }
00094 
00098      template <typename MeasureAuxType> void add_measure_aux(std::shared_ptr<MeasureAuxType> p) { AllMeasuresAux.emplace_back(p); }
00099 
00101     MCSignType average_sign() const { return sign_av; }
00102 
00104     uint64_t percent() const { return done_percent; }
00105 
00106     // An access to the random number generator
00107     random_generator & rng(){ return RandomGenerator;}
00108 
00110     bool start(MCSignType sign_init, std::function<bool ()> const & stop_callback) {
00111      assert(stop_callback);
00112      Timer.start();
00113      sign = sign_init; done_percent = 0; nmeasures = 0;
00114      sum_sign = 0;
00115      bool stop_it=false, finished = false;
00116      uint64_t NCycles_tot = NCycles+ NWarmIterations;
00117      report << std::endl << std::flush;
00118      for (NC =0; !stop_it; ++NC) {
00119       for (uint64_t k=1; (k<=Length_MC_Cycle); k++) { MCStepType::do_it(AllMoves,RandomGenerator,sign); }
00120       if (after_cycle_duty) {after_cycle_duty();}
00121       if (thermalized()) {
00122        nmeasures++;
00123        sum_sign += sign;
00124        for (auto &x : AllMeasuresAux) x();
00125        AllMeasures.accumulate(sign);
00126       }
00127       // recompute fraction done
00128       uint64_t dp = uint64_t(floor( ( NC*100.0) / (NCycles_tot-1)));
00129       if (dp>done_percent)  { done_percent=dp; report << done_percent; report<<"%; "; report <<std::flush; }
00130       finished = ( (NC >= NCycles_tot -1) || converged () );
00131       stop_it = (stop_callback() || finished);
00132      }
00133      report << std::endl << std::endl << std::flush;
00134      Timer.stop();
00135      return finished;
00136 
00137     }
00138 
00140     void collect_results(boost::mpi::communicator const & c) {
00141 
00142      uint64_t nmeasures_tot;
00143      MCSignType sum_sign_tot;
00144      boost::mpi::reduce(c, nmeasures, nmeasures_tot, std::plus<uint64_t>(), 0);
00145      boost::mpi::reduce(c, sum_sign, sum_sign_tot, std::plus<MCSignType>(), 0);
00146 
00147      report(3) << "[Node "<<c.rank()<<"] Acceptance rate for all moves:\n" << AllMoves.get_statistics(c);
00148      report(3) << "[Node "<<c.rank()<<"] Simulation lasted: " << double(Timer) << " seconds" << std::endl;
00149      report(3) << "[Node "<<c.rank()<<"] Number of measures: " << nmeasures  << std::endl;
00150      report(3) << "[Node "<<c.rank()<<"] Average sign: " << sum_sign / double(nmeasures) << std::endl << std::endl << std::flush;
00151   
00152      if (c.rank()==0) {
00153       sign_av = sum_sign_tot / double(nmeasures_tot);
00154       report(2) << "Total number of measures: " << nmeasures_tot << std::endl;
00155       report(2) << "Average sign: " << sign_av << std::endl << std::endl << std::flush;
00156      }
00157       
00158      AllMeasures.collect_results(c);
00159 
00160     }
00161 
00162     // do not use direcly, use the free function it is simpler to call...
00163     template<typename MeasureType> MeasureType       & get_measure(std::string const & name)       { return AllMeasures.template get_measure<MeasureType> (name); }
00164     template<typename MeasureType> MeasureType const & get_measure(std::string const & name) const { return AllMeasures.template get_measure<MeasureType> (name); }
00165  
00166     template<typename MoveType> MoveType       & get_move (std::string const & name)       { return AllMoves.template get_move<MoveType> (name); }
00167     template<typename MoveType> MoveType const & get_move (std::string const & name) const { return AllMoves.template get_move<MoveType> (name); }
00168 
00170     friend void h5_write (h5::group g, std::string const & name, mc_generic const & mc){
00171      auto gr = g.create_group(name);
00172      h5_write(gr,"moves", mc.AllMoves);
00173      h5_write(gr,"measures", mc.AllMeasures);
00174      h5_write(gr,"length_monte_carlo_cycle", mc.Length_MC_Cycle);
00175      h5_write(gr,"number_cycle_requested", mc.NCycles);
00176      h5_write(gr,"number_warming_cycle_requested", mc.NWarmIterations);
00177      h5_write(gr,"number_cycle_done", mc.NC);
00178      h5_write(gr,"number_measure_done", mc.nmeasures);
00179      h5_write(gr,"sign", mc.sign);
00180      h5_write(gr,"sum_sign", mc.sum_sign);
00181     }
00182 
00184     friend void h5_read (h5::group g, std::string const & name, mc_generic & mc){
00185      auto gr = g.open_group(name);
00186      h5_read(gr,"moves", mc.AllMoves);
00187      h5_read(gr,"measures", mc.AllMeasures);
00188      h5_read(gr,"length_monte_carlo_cycle", mc.Length_MC_Cycle);
00189      h5_read(gr,"number_cycle_requested", mc.NCycles);
00190      h5_read(gr,"number_warming_cycle_requested", mc.NWarmIterations);
00191      h5_read(gr,"number_cycle_done", mc.NC);
00192      h5_read(gr,"number_measure_done", mc.nmeasures);
00193      h5_read(gr,"sign", mc.sign);
00194      h5_read(gr,"sum_sign", mc.sum_sign);
00195     }
00196 
00197    private:
00198     random_generator RandomGenerator;
00199     move_set<MCSignType> AllMoves;
00200     measure_set<MCSignType> AllMeasures;
00201     std::vector<measure_aux> AllMeasuresAux;
00202     utility::report_stream report;
00203     uint64_t Length_MC_Cycle;
00204     uint64_t NWarmIterations, NCycles;
00205     uint64_t nmeasures;
00206     MCSignType sum_sign;
00207     utility::timer Timer;
00208     std::function<bool()> after_cycle_duty;
00209     MCSignType sign, sign_av;
00210     uint64_t NC,done_percent;// NC = number of the cycle
00211 
00212     bool thermalized() const { return (NC>= NWarmIterations);}
00213     bool converged() const { return false;}
00214   };

00219  template<typename M,typename T1, typename T2> M const & get_measure(mc_generic<T1,T2> const & s, std::string const & name) { return s.template get_measure<M> (name); }

00223  template<typename M,typename T1, typename T2> M const * get_measure_aux(mc_generic<T1,T2> const & s, std::string const & name) { return s.template get_measure_aux<M> (name); }

00227  template<typename M,typename T1, typename T2> M const & get_move(mc_generic<T1,T2> const & s, std::string const & name) { return s.template get_move<M> (name); }
